dc_title_s: Map of a portion of British Columbia showing the coalfields of Comox, Nanaimo & Cowitchin on Vancouver and adjacent islands and the distribution of the cretaceous coal bearing rocks : also the tertiary rocks of Sooke & Burrard Inlet, to illustrate the report of Mr. James Richardson
dc_description_s: Greenwich prime meridian.; Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.; Includes 3 profiles.|77 x 88 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:250,000|General Map Collection
